name: meraMD
tag_list: directory, doctor, hospital, india-health, diseases-and-conditions, doctors-forum
overview:
MeraMD.com is an online health portal, based out of New Delhi, India. It was founded in May 2007 to provide online health services to users. The company name is a combination of two words.

MeraMD = Mera + MD

Mera is the Hindi (Indian National Language) word for “My”/”Mine” and MD is the abbreviation for “Medicinae Doctor” or simply “Doctor of Medicine”.

meraMd.com is a health portal providing

  • local search for doctors
  • local search for hospitals
  • customised search for medical diseases and conditions from the most trusted and reliable resources on the Internet. The list of internet resources used is human edited, to ensure reliability.
  • medical tools like BMI (Body Mass Index) Calculator and Symptom Checker.
  • doctor only discussion forum
  • information centres - insurance
  • medical store
